info.title: API Endpoints
info.description: Service for interacting with the Fever platform.

tags.name: insights
tags.description: All API operations related to Insights service

tags.name: capacity
tags.description: Capacity API for allocating and reading available capacity.

tags.name: status
tags.description: Status API for reading asset operational status.

tags.name: fever-id
tags.description: Fever ID API for creating and fetching Fever IDs.

tags.name: sites
tags.description: Sites API for creating, fetching and updating sites.

tags.name: assets
tags.description: Assets API for creating, fetching and updating assets.

post.description: Create a Fever ID. Unique within an organization and parent to sites.

get.description: Retrieve the readiness status of a specific site and details of any missing requirements to mark it as ready.

schema.description: A unique ID within an organization, used to identify a feverID, site or asset

post.description: Activates the specified site and its subcomponents, preparing it for Fever to assume control.

schema.description: A unique ID within an organization, used to identify a feverID, site or asset

post.description: Deactivates the specified site and its subcomponents, removing it from Fever's control.

schema.description: A unique ID within an organization, used to identify a feverID, site or asset

immediate.description: Indicates if the deactivation is happening immediately.

scheduledTime.description: The time when the deactivation is scheduled to occur, if not immediate.

reason.description: A brief explanation of why the deactivation is immediate or scheduled.

siteId.description: A unique ID within an organization, used to identify a feverID, site or asset

model.description:
Defines the product model, which may include well-known series names or specific versions provided by the manufacturer. 
This field aids in identifying compatibility, performance characteristics, and technical specifications relevant to the model in use.

inverterId.description: ID of asset that controls unit.

maxPowerWattCharge.description: If there is a charge constraint, max power in watt.

maxPowerWattDischarge.description: If there is a discharge constraint, max power in watt.

nominalEnergyKwH.description: Nominal energy (kWh), represents the amount of energy the battery can store.

cRate.description: Charge or discharge rate relative to battery energy capacity (e.g., 1C means full discharge in 1 hour)

model.description:

This field aids in identifying compatibility, performance characteristics, and technical specifications relevant to the model in use.

deviceIdentifier.description:
Unique identifier for the system, enabling reliable identification when connecting to or managing the device externally. 
This can serve as a client ID for MQTT communication or an identifier when accessing the manufacturer’s operations support system (OSS).

get.description: Get net earnings for date and filter by external id's.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to retrieve earnings, must be at least 2 days prior to the current date.

parameters.name: external-ids
parameters.description: List of external id's to filter by, if not provided all assets will be returned.

items.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

externalId.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

get.description:
Available capacity for product per hour.
Standard: 24 entries
Daylight savings, last Sunday in March: 23 entries
Winter time, last Sunday in October: 25 entries

schema.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

startTime.description:
"The start of the hour (UTC) ISO8601 
Summer time: 22:00:00Z
Winter time: 23:00:00Z"

endTime.description:
The end of the hour (UTC) ISO8601.
Summer time: 22:00:00Z
Winter time: 23:00:00Z

capacityWatt.description: The capacity effect in Watt for the specific hour.

post.description:
Available capacity for product per hour.
Standard: 24 entries
Daylight savings, last Sunday in March: 23 entries
Winter time, last Sunday in October: 25 entries
Allowed invocation time:
9:00-14:00 CET/CEST

schema.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

externalId.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

type.description:
The type of asset.
Possible values are 'espen', 'pixii' and `other'.

status.description:
The current connection status of the asset.
Possible values are 'connected', 'not_connected' and 'unknown'.

lastUpdate.description:
Timestamp of when the asset last reported its state.
The value is formatted as an ISO 8601 date-time string.

updateMs.description:
The amount of time, in milliseconds, that the asset has been running
since the last restart.

modbus.description:
The status of the Modbus connection.
Possible values are 'not_connected', 'connected',
'connected_with_errors' and 'unknown'.

energy.description:
The amount of energy consumed or generated by the asset.
Represented as a double-precision floating-point number.

state.description:
Asset-specific state based on the type of asset.
It could either be for 'espen' or 'pixii' types of assets.

items.description: Product which an asset was qualified for

offsetParam.name: offset
offsetParam.description: The number of items to skip.

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: The max numbers of items in the result.

nominalEnergyKwH.description: Nominal energy (kWh), represents the amount of energy the battery can store.

cRate.description: Charge or discharge rate relative to battery energy capacity (e.g., 1C means full discharge in 1 hour)

model.description:
Defines the product model, which may include well-known series names or specific versions provided by the manufacturer. 
This field aids in identifying compatibility, performance characteristics, and technical specifications relevant to the model in use.

deviceIdentifier.description:
Unique identifier for the system, enabling reliable identification when connecting to or managing the device externally. 
This can serve as a client ID for MQTT communication or an identifier when accessing the manufacturer’s operations support system (OSS).

name.description: A friendly name to help identify the asset.

id.description: A unique ID within an organization, used to identify a feverID, site or asset

AssetObjectPatch.description:
Fields that can be updated in an existing Asset.
Any field that is included will be updated; other fields will remain unchanged.

startTime.description:
"The start of the hour (UTC) ISO8601 
Summer time: 22:00:00Z
Winter time: 23:00:00Z"

endTime.description:
The end of the hour (UTC) ISO8601.
Summer time: 22:00:00Z
Winter time: 23:00:00Z

capacityWatt.description: The capacity effect in Watt for the specific hour.

externalId.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

biddingZone.description: The bidding zone of the asset. [SE1, SE2, SE3, SE4]

mainFuse.description: The size of the main fuse in amps (AMP).

name.description: A friendly name to help identify the asset.

startTime.description:

Winter time: 23:00:00Z"

capacityWatt.description: The capacity effect in Watt for the specific hour.

externalId.description:
A unique user settable ID, used to identify an entity.
This ID is assigned during the entity registration process in Fever backend system.

type.description:
The type of asset.
Possible values are 'espen', 'pixii' and `other'.

status.description:
The current connection status of the asset.
Possible values are 'connected', 'not_connected' and 'unknown'.

lastUpdate.description:
Timestamp of when the asset last reported its state.
The value is formatted as an ISO 8601 date-time string.

updateMs.description:
The amount of time, in milliseconds, that the asset has been running
since the last restart.

modbus.description:
The status of the Modbus connection.
Possible values are 'not_connected', 'connected',
'connected_with_errors' and 'unknown'.

energy.description:
The amount of energy consumed or generated by the asset.
Represented as a double-precision floating-point number.

state.description:
Asset-specific state based on the type of asset.
It could either be for 'espen' or 'pixii' types of assets.

items.description: Product which an asset was qualified for
